Dialogue.Text: Came across you unconscious so I took care of you for a bit, no big deal.
RIP, looks like my fire got put out, wanna help me start it again?
Have you gotten those torches yet?
The campfire is right here when you're ready.
You catch on pretty fast. I think that sums up everything I had to tell you... What are you planning to do next?

Options.Option: Build a cozy place to live

Dialogue.Text: A monster eh? I have heard of some {giant floating eye} terrorizing travelers at night...
Maybe look for a [caravan merchant] or someone who can confirm the rumors.
Quite the explorer you are! Well if uncharted biomes are what you're looking for you couldn't have come to a better place.
There's a place they call the {Crimson} that no adventurer dares enter.
Regardless, you'll have to get some better gear before you try anything like that. I don't get out much these days so why don't you borrow these for now. The rest you'll have to find on your own.
Ah, settling down are we? You think you could find a place for these in that fancy new home of ours? Things start to get heavy after so many years.
Don't get excited, it won't be anything too fancy

Options.Option: I'll make them the best storage space you've ever seen

Dialogue.Text: I'm sure whatever you build it will be great. Stay safe out there!
